name: ccp-install
description: ### Getting Started - `rails new cometchatpro` - `rails generate model User name:string ccp_id:string profile_url:string avatar_url:string` - Add API key and App ID from Comet Chat to `.env` file; add `dotenv-rails` to Gemfile; `bundle`. - `rails generate controller Users`, add to `routes.rb` - Add view for `users/new`. - Add view, routing and controller action for `/users/show/:id`. Use flash messages in the controller.
